name: 林群哲
objective:
無機化學 (II) 主要介紹固態化學，涵蓋晶體結構、半導體、超導體。課程亦教授主族元素之化學特性與配位化學，包括：構造與異構物、鍵結、電子光譜及反應機制。此外，傳授目前最新相關領域之應用。
In inorganic chemistry (II), solid-state chemistry is introduced about crystal structure, semiconductors, and superconductors. Moreover, the chemical properties of main group elements and coordination chemistry are also described in the course. It is focus on structure and isomers, bonding, electronic spectra, and reaction mechanisms. In addition, the novel applications are shown in the course.
